price: Kuma suka je, a jikin rigarsa akwai wani jinin ƙarya. Ya ce: "Ã'a, zukatanku suka ƙawãta muku wani al'amari. Sai haƙuri mai kyau! Kuma Allah ne wanda ake nẽman taimako (a gunSa) a kan abin da kuke siffantãwa."
arabic: وَجَآءُو عَلَىٰ قَمِيصِهِۦ بِدَمٖ كَذِبٖۚ قَالَ بَلۡ سَوَّلَتۡ لَكُمۡ أَنفُسُكُمۡ أَمۡرٗاۖ فَصَبۡرٞ جَمِيلٞۖ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajāū ʿalā qamīṣihi bidamin kadhibin qāla bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran faṣabrun jamīlun wal-lahu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
